DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this cluster randomized trial is to determine whether an intervention implemented in a General Surgery, based in improving patient-provider communication, results in a better diabetes self-management in patients with lower educational level. A secondary objective is to assess whether telephone reinforcement enhances the effect of such intervention.
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness of Two Interventions in Patients With Low Educational Level With Diabetes to Reduce Inequalities in Self-care Behavior
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of DM2, Over 18 years, Low educational level (no college to GBS or ESO), Inadequate glycemic control (glycosylated hemoglobin levels above 7%) Physical or mental condition that prevents the completion of the intervention complications arising from severe DM2 altering routine medical monitoring.
